question: In the beginning of the novel, Janie has just returned from doing what?
answer: Burying the dead - specifically, she has returned from burying Tea Cake in the Everglades after he died from rabies following the hurricane.
quote: So the beginning of this was a woman and she had come back from burying the dead. Not the dead of sick and ailing with friends at the pillow and the feet. She had come back from the sodden and the bloated; the sudden dead, their eyes flung wide open in judgment.
